description: Create an node in Solarwinds Orion.
name: node_create

community.description: The SNMP community to use (don't set *std_community*).

ip_address.description: The ip address to use for polling.

mon_protocol.description: The monitoring protocol to use (only snmpv2 currently supported).

node.description: The Caption for the node to add to Orion.

poller.description: The name of the additional polling engine to use (defaults to primary).

status.description: Protocol to use for Status and Response Time checks.
